title: Focus Bear settings schema
description: Schema for settings for Earn Your Screen Time

shutdown_time.title: Shutdown time
shutdown_time.description: When you will turn off your computer (24hr format).

has_edited_settings.title: Has edited settings
has_edited_settings.description: Boolean value indicating whether settings have been edited

activity_sequence_id.title: Activity Sequence ID
activity_sequence_id.description: Identify each habit whether it completed or not.

name.title: The name of the habit
name.description: Will be displayed when doing your habit.

duration_seconds.title: duration_seconds
duration_seconds.description: How long you will do the habit for (in seconds)

log_quantity.title: log_quantity
log_quantity.description: Do you want to log quantity data after this activity?

log_quantity_question.title: question
log_quantity_question.description: Question to ask when logging quantity data

log_summary_type.title: type
log_summary_type.description: How should the quantity be reported? Average (e.g. mood) or total (e.g. total pushups)

video_urls.title: video_urls
video_urls.description: Possible videos to choose from (a random video will be chosen)

anyOf.title: video_urls
anyOf.description: A youtube video URL to play during this activity.

allowed_urls.title: allowed_urls
allowed_urls.description: Possible URLs to access during this activity

anyOf.title: allowed_urls
anyOf.description: A URL that can be accessed during this activity.

allowed_apps.title: allowed_apps
allowed_apps.description: Possible allowed_apps to access during this activity

anyOf.title: app
anyOf.description: An app that can be accessed during this activity.

choices.title: choices
choices.description: Used if a random choice will be made for this activity

video_urls.title: video_urls
video_urls.description: Possible videos to choose from (a random video will be chosen)

anyOf.title: video_urls
anyOf.description: A youtube video URL to play during this activity.

anyOf.title: app
anyOf.description: An app that can be accessed during this activity.

choices.description: Used if a random choice will be made for this activity

video_urls.title: video_urls
video_urls.description: Possible videos to choose from (a random video will be chosen)

anyOf.title: video_urls
anyOf.description: A youtube video URL to play during this activity.

break_after_minutes.title: break_after_minutes
break_after_minutes.description: How frequently you will take a break (in minutes)

startup_time.title: startup_time
startup_time.description: When you will start your morning routine (24hr format)

break_activities.title: Break Activities
break_activities.description: Activities you will do during breaks.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

activity_sequence_id.title: Activity Sequence ID
activity_sequence_id.description: Identify each habit whether it completed or not.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the break activity

video_urls.title: video_urls
video_urls.description: Possible videos to choose from (a random video will be chosen)

anyOf.title: video_urls
anyOf.description: A youtube video URL to play during this activity.

allowed_urls.title: allowed_urls
allowed_urls.description: Possible URLs to access during this activity

anyOf.title: allowed_urls
anyOf.description: A URL that can be accessed during this activity.

allowed_apps.title: allowed_apps
allowed_apps.description: Possible allowed_apps to access during this activity

anyOf.title: app
anyOf.description: An app that can be accessed during this activity.

is_office_friendly.title: is_office_friendly
is_office_friendly.description: Is this activity safe to perform around other people?

choices.title: choices
choices.description: Used if a random choice will be made for this activity

video_urls.title: video_urls
video_urls.description: Possible videos to choose from (a random video will be chosen)

anyOf.title: video_urls
anyOf.description: A youtube video URL to play during this activity.

log_quantity.title: log_quantity
log_quantity.description: Do you want to log quantity data after this activity?

log_quantity_question.title: log_quantity_question
log_quantity_question.description: Question to ask when logging quantity data

log_summary_type.title: type
log_summary_type.description: How should the quantity be reported? Average (e.g. mood) or total (e.g. total pushups)

duration_seconds.title: duration (seconds)
duration_seconds.description: How long the break activity should last for

include_in_every_break.title: Include in every break
include_in_every_break.description: If you want to do an activity every break, you can set this to true. We'll always use this activity plus randomly choose one non-mandatory activity.
